author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

As requested by CSC DPG and by DQM conveners (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33085#issuecomment-814053266), this PR adds a few 2D summary plots for the CSC TPG data-vs-emulation in the DQM. There are 6 plots, 2 for each object ALCT/CLCT/LCT. For each object I have a 2D plot that shows the efficiency to correctly emulate the data objects, and a plot that shows the percentage of emulated objects that do not have a data counterpart. Emulated and data objects are compared with an `operator==` function, or a custom equality function.

#### PR validation:

Tested on 15k events of Run 322022. A few plots are shown below. Plots with 26k events can be seen here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36046#issuecomment-982223320

Plots

N.A.

@ptcox @tahuang1991 @giovanni-mocellin
title: Add 2D TPG data-vs-emulation summary plots for L1T CSC DQM
